oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Introducing white clover into existing swards and getting variety choice right
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Clavin, Dan
Nolan, Stephen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pasture and forage crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this article Dan Clavin and Stephen Nolan, Teagasc, Athenry discuss the benefits of broadcasting white clover into existing swards and seed variety selection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Clavin, Dan and Nolan, Stephen (2015) Introducing white clover into existing swards and getting variety choice right. Organic Matters, April 2015, pp. 15-19.
